titles.title: A bill for the relief of Marcos Antonio Sanchez-Diaz.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/10/2005--Introduced. Declares Marcos Antonio Sanchez-Diaz to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
